bug.author: alexggmatthews
bug.summary: Update TF version for install instructions in readthedocs
bug.description: Currently says tf0.12 should be tf1.

comments.comment: I changed those in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/GPflow/GPflow/pull/342>#342</denchmark-link> , so it should be enough to remake the docs I guess.

Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mrksr>@mrksr</denchmark-link> I tried to rebuild and found that readthedocs gives an error on tensorflow 1.00 tensorflow-1.0.0-cp34-cp34m-linux_x86_64.whl is not a supported wheel on this platform. I will look into it.
This looks to be an easy fix, we've simply ended up with py 3.4 in docs_require rather than py 3.5 I will do a PR.
